modifier.tinkertantrum.quarky.descriptio: Increases Damage a little for each Item on your hotbar from a mod by Vazkii, scaled to the stack's Size out of its maximum.
modifier.tinkertantrum.overcharging.desc: Builds up Overslime on equipped Armor as you deal Damage.
modifier.tinkertantrum.ferromagnetic.fla: Shocking? No, I don't think so.
_comment1: This is still kinda a Placeholder
modifier.tinkertantrum.ferromagnetic.des: This item is Ferromagnetic, and can be manipulated by Magnetic forces.
modifier.tinkertantrum.overmending.descr: Collects XP when equipped, and converts it to Overslime over time.
modifier.tinkertantrum.veinmining.flavor: Yeah yeah, you miss the Keybind, we know.
modifier.tinkertantrum.veinmining.descri: Allows the Tool to Vein Mine. Higher levels won't Vein Mine any better than the Enchantment can.
material.tinkertantrum.enchanted_amethys: You can stop asking about Veinmining now!
Allows the Tool to Vein Mine, just like the Enchantment! Higher levels won't Vein Mine any better than the Enchantment can.
